title: The God Players: A Legal Thriller
description: What if they discovered a gay gene? Interesting question. But what if they also discovered a way to change that gene in the womb? The interesting question suddenly becomes an explosive international controversy. That's what happens in The God Players. A gay lawyer must defend this provocative procedure in court. Should parents be able to choose the sexual orientation of their children? Do they have the right? The issue is fought out in this courtroom drama that leaves no one unscathed.
author: Phil Valentine
